svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The share of people living in extreme poverty vs GDP per capita, 1990 to
Both measures are adjusted for inflation over time and for price differences between countries (PPP adjustment) and are
expressed in 'international dollars'. Extreme poverty is defined as living with less than 1.90$ per day.
Share living in extreme poverty (< 1.90$ per day)
